lines.text: What kind of wizard is he, huh?
Judging by the bullet hole, I'd have to say... the dead kind!
You oughta hang up your dumb-lookin' wizardy cowboy hat and become a stand-up comedian.
Listen here, pal! I am a living! Aesthetic! Miracle!
I'm the supreme ruler of style! You're just some chump with an octagon for a head!
